mapper.select:
SELECT T1.STATDATE statDate,T1.INDEX_SOURCE userSource,T1.INDEX_VALUE activeUserNum FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR (STAT_TIME, 0, 7) AS statDate,INDEX_SOURCE,INDEX_VALUE FROM DMP_SELECT.STAT_RESULT WHERE INDEX_NAME = 'activeNum' AND STAT_TIME = CONCAT (#{startDate}, '-01') AND STAT_TIME_SPAN = 'M' AND INDEX_SOURCE != '国寿e宝' ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC ) T1 WHERE ROWNUM
<=
( SELECT COUNT (DISTINCT index_source) FROM DMP_SELECT.STAT_RESULT WHERE index_name = 'activeNum' AND stat_time = CONCAT (#{startDate}, '-01') AND stat_time_span = 'M' AND INDEX_SOURCE != '国寿e宝' ) ORDER BY T1.INDEX_VALUE DESC

SELECT T1.STATDATE statDate,T1.INDEX_SOURCE userSource,T1.INDEX_VALUE activeUserNum FROM ( SELECT SUBSTR (STAT_TIME, 0, 7) AS statDate,INDEX_SOURCE,INDEX_VALUE FROM DMP_SELECT.STAT_RESULT WHERE INDEX_NAME = 'activeNum' AND STAT_TIME = CONCAT (#{startDate}, '-01') AND STAT_TIME_SPAN = 'M' AND INDEX_SOURCE = '国寿e宝' ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC ) T1 WHERE ROWNUM
<=1

SELECT
TO_CHAR (CALLTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
concat(TO_CHAR (CALLTIME, 'YYYY-MM'),'-01')
startDate,'国寿e宝' userSource,COUNT (DISTINCT USERID) activeUserNum,#{timeSpan} timeSpan,'activeNum' indexName FROM DMP_ITG.EBAOZHANG_LOGIN WHERE
CALLTIME >= TO_DATE (concat(#{startDate},' 00:00:00'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and CALLTIME <= TO_DATE (concat(#{endDate},' 23:59:59'),'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
GROUP BY
TO_CHAR (CALLTIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
TO_CHAR (CALLTIME, 'YYYY-MM')
SELECT MAX (STAT_TIME) FROM DMP_SELECT.STAT_RESULT WHERE index_name = 'activeNum' AND INDEX_SOURCE = '国寿e宝'
